definition: to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including

sentences.english: Yes, only one herbicide is needed for all Roundup Ready crops.
sentences.chinese: 而且，所有的抗草甘磷作物只需要一種除草劑。

sentences.english: The study concludes that GM herbicide-resistant soybeans have not increased yields.
sentences.chinese: 該項研究結論，轉基因抗除草劑大豆並沒有增加產量。

sentences.english: Monsanto has been paying farmers to use its competitors' herbicides.
sentences.chinese: 孟山都倒貼農民錢去買它的競爭者的除草劑。

sentences.english: Paraquat is an effective and widely used herbicide.
sentences.chinese: 百草枯是一種高效能除草劑。

sentences.english: Put the bottle of weed-killer out of the reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 把那瓶除草劑放在孩子們拿不到的地方。

sentences.english: Life history traits of mictic females in two strains of Brachionus calyciflorus ( Rotifera ).
sentences.chinese: 除草劑草甘膦對萼花臂尾輪蟲生活史特徵的影響。

sentences.english: Biaoxing 10% EC is a good herbicide of controlling Wild oat on spring wheat field.
sentences.chinese: 驃星EC是春小麥田防除野燕麥的優良除草劑。

sentences.english: And their use of more herbicides to fight the weeds is sparking environmental concerns.
sentences.chinese: 他們施用更多的除草劑對抗雜草會導致環境問題。

sentences.english: This compound was an important intermediate to synthesize carfentrazone-ethyl, one super highly effective herbicide.
sentences.chinese: 該化合物是合成超高效除草劑唑酮草酯的重要中間體。

sentences.english: Imazamox is an imidazolinone compound. It is a high-effective post-emergence herbicide used in upland field.
sentences.chinese: 甲氧咪草煙爲咪唑啉酮類高效旱田苗後除草劑。

sentences.english: Clethodim is one of cyclohexanone herbicide with good herbicidal activity.
sentences.chinese: 烯草酮是一種具有優良除草活性的環己二酮類除草劑。

sentences.english: Atrazine is an herbicide used worldwide, and has been concerned because of its long half-life, probable reproductive and developmental toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 阿特拉津是一種世界範圍廣泛使用的除草劑。

sentences.english: New quinclorac is an excellent chemical herbicide for controlling barnyard grass in paddy fields.
sentences.chinese: 新型二氯喹啉酸是水稻田防除稗草的優良化學除草劑。

sentences.english: It took lots of herbicides to make it work but that’s another story.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這樣做，得用許多除草劑，這又是另一回事了。

sentences.english: so we don't use like pesticides or herbicides or anything.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們不用任何像殺蟲劑或除草劑類的東西。

sentences.english: The article studies the inductive effect of erythrocytes nucleus of the toad, Bufo gargarizans by herbicide butachlor.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究除草劑丁草胺對蟾蜍紅細胞核的誘變效應。
